title: Morning Coffee
description: Start your day right with a blend of upbeat tunes, local weather, and community announcements. Sarah J. brings you the perfect mix to wake up to, featuring local business highlights and transit updates.

title: Local News Hour
description: In-depth coverage of the stories directly affecting our valley. Town council updates, school board meetings, and local sports. We bring you the voices of your neighbors on the issues that matter most.

title: Lunchtime Jazz
description: Smooth jazz, bebop, and fusion to accompany your midday break. Marcus curates a sophisticated selection of standards and modern cuts to ease you through your afternoon.

title: Community Voices
description: An open platform for local non-profits, artists, and organizers to discuss their work and upcoming events. Discover the grassroots initiatives making a difference in the Central Valley.

title: Tech Talk
description: Demystifying tech for everyone. Dave covers the latest gadgets, digital privacy tips, and local tech initiatives. Learn how to navigate the digital world with confidence and curiosity.

title: Valley Voices
description: Exploring the rich history of our region through interviews with long-time residents and local historians. Preserving the stories and heritage of the Central Valley for future generations.

title: Midweek Mix
description: An eclectic mix of indie, rock, and pop to get you over the hump. Expect the unexpected as DJ Al spins deep cuts and new discoveries from across the musical spectrum.

title: Friday Night Live
description: Live recordings of local bands performing at venues around the valley. Support local music and enjoy the energy of a live show from the comfort of your home.

title: Market Live Remote
description: Broadcasting live from the Valley Harvest Community Market. Interviews with vendors and shoppers, and live music from the market stage.

title: Sunday Best
description: Gospel, soul, and inspirational music to uplift your spirit on Sunday mornings. A soulful start to your week with messages of hope and community.

title: Evening Chill
description: Downtempo beats and ambient soundscapes to wind down your day. The perfect accompaniment for relaxation, study, or late-night reflection.
